title: Heavy Rain Expected in Tehran Tomorrow
summary: Meteorologists warn of heavy rainfall and possible flooding in Tehran. Citizens are advised to take precautions and avoid unnecessary travel.

title: Air Quality Improves in Karaj
summary: Recent winds have cleared much of the pollution in Karaj, resulting in improved air quality and better visibility across the city.

title: Sunny Skies Ahead for Qazvin
summary: Qazvin residents can look forward to clear and sunny weather for the next few days, with temperatures remaining mild.

title: Zanjan Prepares for Cooler Nights
summary: Temperatures in Zanjan are expected to drop during the night. Authorities recommend keeping warm and checking heating systems.
